mapper.insert: insert into GASCHEDULE (MPSNO, PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, PARTNO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS) values (#{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{machineno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{partno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proctime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select MPSNO, PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, PARTNO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS from GASCHEDULE
mapper.insert: insert into GASchedule(mpsno,processno,machineno,proctime,starttime,endtime,status) (select mpsno,processno,machineno,proctime,starttime,endtime,status from GA where cast(processno as integer) < ${pno} and trim(mpsno)=#{mpsno})
mapper.update: update GASchedule set partno=#{partno} where trim(mpsno)=#{mpsno}
update GASchedule set proctime=0 where cast(processno as integer) < cast(#{processno} as integer) and trim(mpsno)=#{mpsno}
mapper.insert: insert into GASchedule(mpsno,processno,machineno,proctime,starttime,endtime,status) (select mpsno,processno,machineno,proctime,starttime,endtime,status from GA where cast(processno as integer) < #{end} and cast(processno as integer) > #{start} and trim(mpsno)=#{mpsno})

insert into GASchedule(mpsno,processno,machineno,proctime,starttime,endtime,status) (select mpsno,processno,machineno,proctime,starttime,endtime,status from GA where cast(processno as integer) < 16 and cast(processno as integer) > 10 and trim(mpsno)=#{mpsno})
